name: No Bueno Canyon
description:
Easy canyon with a few downclimbs. More fun way to reach West Clear Creek than taking Calloway trail.

Use FR-9693V to access. Also possible to access FR-9693V by going down FR-142B which eventually meets up with FR-9693V. Road is pretty rough in spots with medium sized boulders, down trees, and rutted out road.

Approach

Follow FR-9693V towards canyon. Leave FR-9693V and head towards main canyon or Bueno Tank. Canyon has a few down trees to hike through.

Descent

Continue the a few down trees, overall not very brushy. A few fun downclimbs.

R1: 40' optional off of tree. Also possible to bypass downclimbing RDC.

A few more good downclimbs before reaching West Clear Creek. A of the couple downclimbs would be challenging to upclimb back up canyon.

Exit

Go downstream of West Clear Creek about 1000' to Calloway trail LDC. A couple of deep swims in West Clear Creek to get to trail head. Follow Calloway trail up to road. Follow road back to vehicle.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background

Unlikely first descent, but first known beta gathering descent done by Melissa Gibbons and Erek Burek on Sept 4, 2022.
